Dear friends @ LowEndTalk

We present you our **XEN Memorial day special**:

    Premium Citrix Xenserver Platform
    Not a single byte oversold !!!

    30 GB SATA HDD (if you are looking for super fast drives this is not for you)
    1TB of premium BW
    DALLAS - USA
    $7 Per month

Please note that quantities are limited.
